ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors
ygData.msgSnippet: I was able to charm them at level 30 but it s safer to do it at 32, they resist a LOT at level 30 and 31.  32 it gets a lot better.  I stuck to Clopses and
ygData.messageBody:
I was able to charm them at level 30 but it's safer to do it at 32, they
resist a LOT at level 30 and 31. 32 it gets a lot better. I stuck to
Clopses and griffies and such till level 32.

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:15 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors


> What level should I start thinking about charming Hill Giants? Am I
really
> asking this question??? Never though I would before Kunark, but I expect
to
> get deep into Hell#1 this weekend so I guess it is time to ask.
>
> Kitasi
>
>
> Hehehe you can charm up to 5 levels above you. Even with 200 charisma
you
> would hit the 6 level cap. The 37th level cap is just the max that the
SONG
> can charm. You can only charm about 5 levels above you (and only about 3
> levels above reliably)
>
>
